snippet.title: Shyness
snippet.description: * Shyness What Is Shyness? Shyness is a feeling of fear or discomfort caused by other people, especially in new situations or among strangers. Shyness is an unpleasant feeling of self-consciousnessâ€”a fear of what other people are thinking. This fear can inhibi...

snippet.title: Super Spice of the Week: Ginger
snippet.description: * Super Spice of the Week: Ginger Ginger has been used since ancient times as a healing medicine in Asian, Arabic, and Indian cultures.Ginger has a spicy and slightly sweet taste with a strong, pungent aroma. Ginger is rich in volatile oils,essential fatty acids, beta-carotene, and a...

snippet.title: Asians and the Stigma of Mental Illness: National Minority Health and Health Disparities Month
snippet.description: * Asians and the Stigma of Mental Illness: National Minority Health and Health Disparities Month Asians with mental health problems are very much on our minds this week.Who are Asian Americans? snippet.title: Fast Food Erases the Benefits of a Traditional Asian Diet
snippet.description: * Fast Food Erases the Benefits of a Traditional Asian Diet Singapore is a remarkably multiethnic society, combining elements of Chinese, British, Indian, and Indonesian cultures. While the cuisine is diverse and not always heart healthy, it has traditionally included plenty of seafood, fruits, and vegetables...
